data.comment: The big names in today's match at RheinEnergieStadion have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 2, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In Cologne, 1. FC Cologne push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Sven Jablonski awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
In the minute 6, In Cologne, Andre Silva of Frankfurt is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 8, 1. FC Cologne advance rapidly upfield but Sven Jablonski blows for offside.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Sven Jablonski signals a Frankfurt throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Frankfurt at RheinEnergieStadion.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frankfurt have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 13, Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 15, Kingsley Ehizibue for 1. FC Cologne has been booked by Sven Jablonski and receives a first yellow card.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 18, In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Makoto Hasebe (Frankfurt) has received a yellow card from Sven Jablonski.
Frankfurt needs to be cautious. 1. FC Cologne have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, 1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 21, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Jakobs of 1. FC Cologne is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 29, Frankfurt drives forward and Andre Silva gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sven Jablonski signals a Frankfurt throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 30, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 32, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bas Dost.
Frankfurtâ€™s Bas Dost is on his feet again at RheinEnergieStadion.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 38, Can 1. FC Cologne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
The match at RheinEnergieStadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andre Silva, who is down injured.
In the minute 41, Andre Silva has recovered and rejoins the match in Cologne.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Frankfurt just outside 1. FC Cologne's area.
In the minute 43, Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Frankfurt attack but Martin Hinteregger's header doesn't find the target.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Penalty! Sven Jablonski points to the spot, great chance for Frankfurt...
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Cologne.
Goal! Andre Silva gives Frankfurt a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
The second half has started at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Frankfurt are pushing forward but Daichi Kamada's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Goal! Ondrej Duda levels the match at 1-1.
Kingsley Ehizibue with an assist there.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 54, Elvis Rexhbecaj (1. FC Cologne) has received a first yellow card.
Frankfurt's Daichi Kamada breaks free at RheinEnergieStadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
In the minute 56, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Sven Jablonski signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
Frankfurt's Stefan Ilsanker gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Almamy Toure's header is off-target for Frankfurt.
In the minute 59, 1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
In Cologne 1. FC Cologne drive forward through Jannes Horn. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
1. FC Cologne's Sebastian Andersson has run offside.
Ondrej Duda (1. FC Cologne) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
Free kick Frankfurt.
1. FC Cologne's Jannes Horn has been booked in Cologne.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Cologne.
At RheinEnergieStadion, 1. FC Cologne are penalized for being offside.
Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced Steven Zuber with Amin Younes. This is the first substitution made today by Adi Hutter.
Frankfurt's Bas Dost is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Frankfurt drive upfield and Amin Younes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a 1. FC Cologne defender.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Frankfurt are coming forward and Almamy Toure gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 71, Sven Jablonski awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
1. FC Cologne's Sebastian Andersson misses with an attempt on goal.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Salih Ozcan is replacing Ondrej Duda for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
In the minute 74, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, 1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Free kick in a good position for 1. FC Cologne!
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 79, Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Sven Jablonski signals a Frankfurt throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kingsley Ehizibue for 1. FC Cologne who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team has substituted Kingsley Ehizibue with Benno Erik Schmitz. Markus Gisdol is thus making his second change.
Amin Younes for Frankfurt gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
In the minute 85, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a second substitution, with Aymen Barkok replacing Andre Silva.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Frankfurt at RheinEnergieStadion.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At RheinEnergieStadion, Amin Younes has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In Cologne Frankfurt attack through Martin Hinteregger. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 89, Sven Jablonski awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Anthony Modeste is on a sub for Sebastian Andersson for 1. FC Cologne.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick Frankfurt.
Sven Jablonski signals a Frankfurt throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Anthony Modeste for 1. FC Cologne gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at RheinEnergieStadion.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Cologne Frankfurt attack through Aymen Barkok. The finish is off target, however.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
